system.description: Your body serves as a natural conduit for arcane energies as well as emotional ones. You know the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.86re3h2jgfr45ml4]{Resistance} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you may cast the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.wa2nd43b9dvkh1yu]{Protection from Evil and Good} once per long rest. At 5th level, you may cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.hnvt4tnuww6o4vvi]{Calm Emotions} once per long rest. You do not require material components for these spells, and your spellcasting ability for them is either Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, whichever is highest.
